events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle at an intersection during heavy rain, resulting in significant damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the details of the collision and confirming the involvement of the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the case and reach out to the claimant for further information.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the claimant was notified that the process is underway.
The claimant was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for further assessment.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed images of the collision damage and an official police report.
The internal team began investigation on the submitted documents and vehicle condition to determine liability and damage extent.
The investigation concluded that the accident was a single-vehicle collision caused by slippery roads with no third-party involvement.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and rental reimbursement was proposed to the claimant based on the investigation results.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the quick processing and proposed settlement, appreciating the clear communication.
The claim was formally approved by the claims committee after review of all documentation and adherence to policy terms.
The payment settlement was issued to the claimant to cover all approved repair costs and associated expenses documented in the claim.
The claim case has been closed successfully following full payment and confirmation from the claimant that the issue has been resolved.
